rowprovider.param: select gi.GrantNumber, gi.[BHCMISID], convert(bigint,p.partnerid) _partnerid, isnull (CONVERT(varchar, convert(bigint,p.partnerid)), 'UDS' + gi.[BHCMISID]) as pkey, '01/01/2011' as ReportingPeriodBegin, '12/31/2011' as ReportingPeriodEnd, gi.[GranteeName], gi.[GranteeAddress], gi.[GranteeOtherAddress], gi.[GranteeCity], gi.[GranteeState], gi.[GranteeZipCode] , case when p.partnerid is null then geo.Longitude else null end as longitude , case when p.partnerid is null then geo.Latitude else null end as Latitude from [HRSA_UDS_2011].[dbo].TBLGRANTEEINFOGEOCODED geo, [HRSA_UDS_2011].[dbo].[GranteeInfo] gi left outer join InformationExplorer.dbo.Partner p on gi.[BHCMISID]=p.UDSGranteeID where gi.[BHCMISID] = geo.[BHCMISID]
